ai-snp2.9:1.2_0: Remember me the deeds that make you man out.
ai-snp2.9:1.3_0: A person who has rightly settled
ai-snp2.9:2.1_0: “One should burn up what is decayed,
ai-snp2.9:2.2_0: and the wrong time to see him.
ai-snp2.9:2.3_0: he gave a Dhamma talk, knows the right time,
ai-snp2.9:2.4_0: I’d listen to what is well spoken.
ai-snp2.9:3.1_0: learned ones at the right time,
ai-snp2.9:3.4_0: recollecting them both in the same way,
ai-snp2.9:4.1_0: Delighting in the teaching, enjoying the teaching,
ai-snp2.9:4.2_0: standing on the teaching, in accordance with the Teaching.
ai-snp2.9:4.3_0: The words of the Dhammadinnā is of definiteness,
ai-snp2.9:6.2_0: Employed, you should transgress in immersion,
ai-snp2.9:7.1_0: They delight in the Dhamma and delight in the Noble One.
ai-snp2.9:7.2_0: they are unsurpassed in mind, and through the supreme life.
